---

</details>
</tool-use>

---

<tool-use data-tool-type="write" data-tool-name="search_replace">

<details><summary>Tool use: **code_edit** • Edit file: styles.css</summary>

**Chunk 1**
Lines added: 1, lines removed: undefined

```diff
@@ -771,4 +771,5 @@
      font-size: 1rem;
      background: transparent;
+     color: var(--text-color);
      text-align: center;
  }
```

---



---


Fixed the Feedback Modal input text color for dark mode.

## Files Modified:
1. **styles.css** - Added `color: var(--text-color);` to `.feedback-textarea` class

The `.feedback-textarea` class was missing the `color` property, so it didn't use the CSS variable that changes with dark mode. It now uses `var(--text-color)`, which is:
- `#000000` (black) in light mode
- `#ffffff` (white) in dark mode

The text in the feedback textarea now adapts to the color scheme when dark mode is enabled. The placeholder color (`#999`) remains consistent with other inputs in the codebase and works in both modes.

---
